column4: what can it be that cause my computer to randomly loose all connectivity.. it can ping itself, but not the router
i have been keeping an eye on the log files and they say nothing
try rmmod'ding the module and modprobing it again
i cant figure out which module it is
can you paste the output of dmesg to pastebin ?
have to reboot it and hope it stays up while i paste it :D
yes - all I can see is your gigabit network card being eth0
and when it crashes its not leaving anything in the log files
id like to restart the module though
